steam.title: Steam
steam.description: If you log out of Steam, you will have to log back in to download a new version of Beat Saber.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Choose the two main colours of BSManager.

installation-folder.title: Installation folder
installation-folder.description: Change the default folder for Beat Saber versions and other upcoming features.
